name: Ground Control (itch) (Platypuce Productions)
description:
Made for the 2017 Global game jam

Use left and right arrow keys to rotate, up and down arrow keys to accelerate and decelerate. Space bar to shoot a blip. Press 'z' to warp. 'R' to restart game

Rescue all the astronauts to win!

Created as part of the 2017 Global Game Jam
